definition: rotation of crops (to preserve fertility of soil)
wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

sentences.english: Effect of long-term fallow and cultivation on soil fertility in rice-based cropping system .
sentences.chinese: 水旱輪作地區土壤長期休閒與耕種的肥力效應。

sentences.english: It is a breach for agriculture and animal husbandry to bring grass field rotate into planting system.
sentences.chinese: 把草田輪作納入種植體制中是農牧結合的突破口。

sentences.english: It must be said in favour of leys that they give much more flexibility in grass land management.
sentences.chinese: 必須充分肯定輪作草場在管理方面有較大的靈活性。

sentences.english: Extend the cereal-forage rotation system reinforce the combination of agriculture and animal husbandry.
sentences.chinese: 推廣糧草輪作制度，加強農牧結合。

sentences.english: However, it is more convenient to view the plane motion of a planet gear as a composition of two rotations.
sentences.chinese: 例如，行星圓柱齒輪機構，行星輪作平面運動。

sentences.english: Unde rotation of medium rice and wheat, zinc fertilizer could be only applied on rice.
sentences.chinese: 如果是中稻和小麥輪作，則可以只在水稻上施用鋅肥。

sentences.english: It is impracticable to go for early bite from longer leys.
sentences.chinese: 利用長期輪作草場進行早期放牧是不切實際的。

sentences.english: Crop rotation is the best way to increase output.
sentences.chinese: 想提高產量，最好的辦法是倒茬輪作。

sentences.english: All of those indicated that"WWS"was beneficial to balance soil nutrient.
sentences.chinese: 表明WWS輪作模式有利於土壤養分的均衡。
